content: ° adelheid ° by diana krenz _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate crochet terms us this pattern is available in english only abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring round - round space/sps - space/spaces skip - skip st/sts - stitch/stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch yo - yarn over lp - loop beg - beginning stand - standing chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet start with a magic_ring special stitches round 1 in magic_ring start with a beg single_crochet ch2 single_crochet 5 times ch2 close beg single_crochet - ch1 single_crochet into magic_ring or st/space with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 6 single_crochet 6 ch2 space beg double_crochet - ch1 single_crochet into magic_ring or st/space ch1 bpsc - back post single_crochet insert hook from back to front round 2 skip all single_crochet around the post of indicated st with new color stand 2dccl in any ch2 space ch2 2dccl in 2dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a same chain space 2dccl ch2 2dccl in next chain space repeat loop yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times yo and pull 5 times close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 12 2dccl through last 3 loops 6 ch2 space 2trcl - yo 2 times insert hook in indicated space yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times - round 2 finished twice yo pull through all 3 loops sppuff - special puff yo insert hook in indicated st/space and pull up a loop 3 times yo and pull through all loops except the last loop 2 loops on hook yo and pull through last 2 loops popcorn - make 4 double_crochet in same space remove hook and insert hook in top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through round 3 skip all cluster i often use a standing stitch at the beginning of a with new color stand double_crochet in any ch2 space 4 double_crochet in same chain space round work these stitches as a normal stitch but at ch1 5 double_crochet in next ch2 space repeat 5 times ch1 close with a the beginning with a slip knot on your hook to start a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 30 double_crochet 6 ch1 space round ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus september 2023 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine round 4 with new color stand bpsc around first double_crochet of any round 6 with new color stand bpsc around first double_crochet following 5-double_crochet-group *bpsc around next 4 double_crochet ch1 in front of any ch3 space *bpsc around next 4 st ch1 in front of round 5 round 3 popcorn in space between 2 2dccl from round 2 directly popcorn in skip ch1 space from round 4 before the popcorn ch2 skip popcorn popcorn in below ch1 skip ch1 space behind bpsc
